ygData.subject: RE: [EverQuest] terris-thule pp for sale
ygData.msgSnippet: The place I think he is talking about, you ll need 2 computers and 2 high lvl characters 53+ and you ll have to work to get the 30k. 23 mobs every 20 minutes.
ygData.messageBody:
The place I think he is talking about, you'll need 2 computers and 2 high
lvl characters 53+ and you'll have to work to get the 30k.

23 mobs every 20 minutes.
Each mob will drop atleast 15 plat worth of loot, up to 20 plat sometimes.
15 x 23 = 345 plat every 20 minutes
Work for 10 hours = 34,500 plat

Not a bad work day if you could find enough idiots to buy plat for real US
dollars. But I can tell you, getting this kind of platinum can be done. I
know when I need platinum fast, I can go to this plat hole and grind out
some good plat, also get exp here up to lvl 55.

-----Original Message-----
From: Michael Rhodes [SMTP:mrhodes@...]
Sent: Monday, April 30, 2001 5:33 AM
To: EverQuest@yahoogroups.com
Subject: RE: [EverQuest] terris-thule pp for sale

I'd be careful giving that info out.... as much as I would love to
know where to get the kind of plat, I'm sure if everyone knew, the place
would be camped worse then any other place in eq

just my 2cp

Mike

-----Original Message-----
From: The Mad Macinchaote [mailto:scendera@...]
Sent: Monday, April 30, 2001 5:22 AM
To: EverQuest@yahoogroups.com
Subject: Re: [EverQuest] terris-thule pp for sale


Where?

----- Original Message -----
From: Nygaardr, FC3 <mailto:nygaardr@...>

To: 'EverQuest@yahoogroups.com'
<mailto:'EverQuest@yahoogroups.com'>
Sent: Monday, April 30, 2001 4:03 AM
Subject: RE: [EverQuest] terris-thule pp for sale

What a rip though. $150 US for 10,000pp??!?! So
your telling me I can make $450 US a day playing EQ? Thats crazy if anyone
would pay that much. I know of one spot where you can easily farm 30k pp a
day if not more, seems a bit crazy to me,

Mu

-----Original Message-----
From: Michael Rhodes [
mailto:mrhodes@... <mailto:mrhodes@...> ]
Sent: Sunday, April 29, 2001 9:27 PM
To: EverQuest@yahoogroups.com
Subject: RE: [EverQuest] terris-thule pp for
sale


Is there anyone out there that would
actually pay real money for this?? There is no way I would... Am I crazy?

Mike
